oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2011-04-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 26, 2011. Professional songwriters with student co-writers performing songs they have written together during the course of the school year. Hosted by Laura Bell Bundy.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Laura Bell Bundy;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include; Welcome To The South (Misty Rae with Morgan Money); You Are My Light (Gary Michael Smith with Shaymus Aiava); Have You Ever Been Scared? (Bob Spanburgh with Autumn Looper); The Headless Gownsman Of Sewanee (Sandy Ramos with Rose Civitts); I Only See You In My Dreams (Deborah Adams with Samantha Dyer); Happens To The Best Of Us (Bill Renfrew with Ethan Sevier); Smiles (Jerry Vandiver with Callahan Smith and Taleigh Woods); Pickles On Ponies (John Feld with Nolan Davidson and Michael Mahoney); The Songwriting Blues (Casey Kelly with Latiana Carter); 7.8 (Jason Duke with Jaleigh Rogan, Abby Sholar, and Liz Wood); Completely Wrapped Up In Them (Candace Corrigan and Janne Henshaw with Maddie Langlinais); Missing (Tim Buppert with Madison Escue); My Dream (Jeff Dayton with Garrett Christiensen); What’s Best For Me (Simon McCain with Allison Ward); Krystal’s Burgers (Shane Adams with Carson Lovell and Eric Williams); China And Wine (Laura Bell Bundy);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bundy; Laura Bell; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
